Description: Mould-made pottery lamp decorated on the discus with a bust of Isis within a cabled rim. Between the wick-hole and discus-rim are small volutes. At the rear is an unpierced notched handle. The lamp stands on a raised base.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q2065)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Wellcome Institute for the History of Medicine (trustees)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Sir Henry Solomon Wellcome
